description: The Central Oklahoma CPCU Scholarship is open to declared Insurance & Risk Management majors or Insurance minors with the following eligibility requirements: Eligibility Requirements Minimum 2.5 GPA Declared Finance-Insurance & Risk Management major OR Insurance minor OR Insurance & Risk Management minor Enrolled in at least 6 hours Must have completed at least 15 hours at time of application Member of the Actuary, Insurance & Risk Management Club

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
